title: 2012/125/EU: Council Decision of 28 February 2012 appointing a Member of the Court of Auditors
header:
29.2.2012 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 55/18
COUNCIL DECISION
of 28 February 2012
appointing a Member of the Court of Auditors
(2012/125/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 286(2) thereof,
Having regard to the opinion of the European Parliament (1),
Whereas:
(1) The term of office of Mr Juan RAMALLO MASSANET is due to expire on 29 February 2012.
(2) Therefore, a new appointment should be made,
main_body: Mr Baudilio TOMÉ MUGURUZA is hereby appointed Member of the Court of Auditors for the period from 1 March 2012 to 28 February 2018.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 2012.
For the Council
The President
N. WAMMEN
(1)  Opinion of 14 February 2012 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
